sections.title: Hinterlander (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Hinterlander class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple weapons, longbows, light armor, medium armor, and shields (except tower shields).

sections.title: Favored Enemy (Ex) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Functions like ranger's favored enemy but with unique benefits for each creature type and different progression (additional enemy at 8th level instead of 5th and 10th).

sections.title: Master Archer (Ex) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Grants bonus archery feats at 1st, 3rd, and 5th levels from a specific list, ignoring prerequisites, but benefits only apply in light, medium, or no armor.

sections.title: Fast Movement (Ex) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Increases base land speed by 10 feet at 2nd level.

sections.title: Favored Terrain (Hinterland) (Ex) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to initiative and specific skills when within range of small settlements (2,000 or fewer population), including trackless movement.

sections.title: Hinterland Stride (Ex) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Functions like woodland stride but also applies to non-magical difficult terrain in settled areas with 2,000 or fewer inhabitants.

sections.title: Chosen Kin (Su) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Allows designation of allies as chosen kin who gain half the hinterlander's favored terrain and defended hearth bonuses within range.

sections.title: Defended Hearth (Su) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Designates settlements as defended hearths, granting creature sense within 5 miles and stacking favored terrain bonuses after 24-hour study.

sections.title: Imbue Arrow (Su) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Allows placing area-effect spells on arrows, functioning exactly like the arcane archer ability of the same name.

sections.title: Waymarker Travel (Sp) (Hinterlander)
sections.description: Creates waymarkers in defended hearths and allows teleportation to them once per day as a move action using word of recall.
